div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1317 Rhodes or SW Asia Minor, c. 1900 (862) Burial: c. 190 B.C. (M) Contents: 21+ AR Lysimachus: c. 12 tetradr. Eumenes I: 3 tetradr. Attalus I: 2 tetradr. Eumenes II: 1 tetradr. Antiochus II: 1 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Ti- grim) Antiochus III: 2 tetradr. (Antiocheia 1, Tarsus 1) Small AR of unc. attrib. Disposition: London 8 Wace, JIAN 1903, pp. 140-8, illus. Hill, NC 1925, p. 12 Regling, ZfN 1928, p. 97 Westermark, Philetairos, p. 15
